etymology.description: 中(中) (zhōng, "middle; center") + 国(國) (guó, "country; nation") combines to mean a centrally situated country, often referred to as China. The notion of "Middle Kingdom" reflects historical views of China's position in the world.
etymology.interpretation: China is perceived historically as the central nation, a view dating back to ancient times when Chinese civilization was considered the heart of the world.
etymology.simplification: Simplified 中 and 國 to 中 and 国

examples.chinese: 我来自中国(我來自中國)。
中国经济迅速发展(中國經濟迅速發展)，吸引了世界目光(吸引了世界目光)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngguó jīngjì xùnsù fāzhǎn, xīyǐnle shìjiè mùguāng.
examples.english: China's economy is rapidly developing, attracting global attention.

examples.chinese: 中国的风景壮丽(中國的風景壯麗)，历史悠久(歷史悠久)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngguó de fēngjǐng zhuànglì, lìshǐ yōujiǔ.
examples.english: China has magnificent landscapes and a long history.
